content:
I'd be happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have access to real-time information and I don't know which Modern Art Museum you are referring to. There are many modern art museums around the world, each with their own exhibition schedule.

But I can suggest a few options to help you find the information you're looking for:

1. Check the website: You can visit the website of the specific Modern Art Museum you're interested in and look for their exhibitions page. Most museums list their upcoming exhibitions and events on their website.
2. Search online: You can search for "Modern Art Museum [city name] exhibitions" or "Modern Art Museum [city name] upcoming exhibitions" to find relevant information.
3. Contact the museum directly: You can contact the museum directly via phone or email to ask about their upcoming exhibitions. They should be able to provide you with the information you're looking for.
4. Follow the museum on social media: Many museums have social media accounts where they post updates about their exhibitions and events.

I hope these suggestions help you find the information you're looking for!
